description.translate: The chosen one of this world, to whom time and space obey, knows no limit to his will.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Volonté de fer\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§aL'élu de ce monde, à qui obéissent temps et\"}","{\"text\":\"§aespace, ne connaît aucune limite à sa volonté.\"}","{\"text\":\"§aThe chosen one of this world, to whom\"}","{\"text\":\"§atime and space obey, knows no limit to his will.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7DAR§a2 §7HAS§c-2 §7SPD§c-1\"}"]}}
